content:
I want to create a web application with the objective of managing orders from e-commerce businesses. The app should integrate the main e-commerce platforms available in the market (woocommerce, shopify, prestashop and so on) and retrieve all data related to orders, customers and products. The app is planed to have many features, but to start it will only focus on managing order status and update them in the website database, send automated emails, allow the user to print a sheet with all the order information, present statistics, print shipping labels, and some other.

With this knowledge, tell me which of the following tech stacks is more suited, which will be faster to develop and which will need more resources during development. Answer in depth and in a detailed and techinal manner:

solution 1: node.js + mongoDB + reactJS
solution 2: .net (C#) + SQL Server + reactJS
